Sentencas: Fuel cells represent a clean and efficient alternative to existing methods of energy production.
Titulo: Performance modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells make use of a solid ceramic, zirconia, which at high temperatures can conduct oxygen ions, to produce electricity directly from the combustion of methane or other hydrocarbons.
Titulo: Performance modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here we present a mathematical model for a tubular solid oxide fuel cell, which includes consideration of advection, diffusion and electrochemical activity.
Titulo: Performance modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The chemical reaction scheme includes the effects of both steam reforming and partial oxidation of methane, as well as carbon deposition on the anode surface.
Titulo: Performance modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the steady state, an asymptotic analysis is performed to find the composition of the exhaust gas.
Titulo: Performance modelling of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results are compared with experimental data and good agreement is obtained.
Titulo: Performance modelling of solid oxide fuel cells
